name: Ready and Willing
description: Starfleet is full of ensigns eager to explore and make their mark on the stars. Some a little too eager, perhaps. Help guide the next generation of Starfleet and ensure they don't get in too much trouble.
rules:
-- This is an Anomaly Event! The following rule changes will apply:
1. Total number of leaderboard ranks eligible for Treadmill Crew rewards is reduced from 1500 to 1000, non-crew reward amounts for the top 1000 are increased.
2. New Threshold Reward: Legendary Honorable Citation at 500000 VP.
3. New Threshold Reward: Treadmill Crew at 1000000 VP.
4. Faction Missions have additional 5-hour tier that gives out 10x Victory Points for every mission.
-- Unique Dominion, Ferengi Alliance, and Romulan Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Sonya, Adira, D. Sulu, or Resourceful crew will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Sonya, Adira, D. Sulu, or Resourceful
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Q
featured_crew.flavor: Some say the Conquistadors were simply robbers, others that they were great conquerors. There's no doubt that both options suit Q.

featured_crew.name: Adira
featured_crew.flavor: Following the defeat of the Emerald Chain, Adira became part of the Starfleet and joined the crew of the U.S.S. Discovery as an ensign.

action.name: Uh, Captain, We... We Have A Problem.

rewards.name: Dominion Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Dominion faction missions.

rewards.name: Ferengi Alliance Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Ferengi Alliance faction missions.

rewards.name: Romulan Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Romulan Star Empire faction missions.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: 10x S. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: 10 Standard Boosts. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Rutherford
rewards.flavor: Rutherford loves being an engineer, and spends his free time talking about how great the Cerritos is with Tendi.

rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Dominion faction missions.

rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Romulan Star Empire faction missions.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Tokens
rewards.flavor: Requisition Shuttle Tokens grant access to an additional Shuttle to use for a single Faction Mission.

rewards.name: Reward Multiplier
rewards.flavor: (Shuttle Missions Only) 2x rewards.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Hon. Citation
rewards.flavor: Fuse this item with Legendary crew to increase their star rating by one up to their maximum.

rewards.name: Q
rewards.flavor: Some say the Conquistadors were simply robbers, others that they were great conquerors. There's no doubt that both options suit Q.

rewards.flavor: Some say the Conquistadors were simply robbers, others that they were great conquerors. There's no doubt that both options suit Q.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Some say the Conquistadors were simply robbers, others that they were great conquerors. There's no doubt that both options suit Q.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

goals.flavor: Bring chaos to order with the Dominion.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

goals.flavor: Put the ensigns to work with the Ferengi Alliance.

screens.text: "I just can't wait to get started! And with the temporal anomaly crisis, think of all the amazing people we can meet from across time - and universes! Oh, I wonder what my mirror self is like!"
"Be careful what you wish for! The mirror universe is no joke. But I know how you feel. I'm ready to see what Starfleet in this time period is like!"
"I've already been given some interesting offers for away missions. Has anyone ever heard of some place called 'Quark's' before?"
"Not that I don't trust our ensigns to handle things, but I'd appreciate if you kept an eye on them, Captain. Y'know, just in case."
"I just can't wait to get started! And with the temporal anomaly crisis, think of all the amazing people we can meet from across time - and universes! Oh, I wonder what my mirror self is like!"
"Be careful what you wish for! The mirror universe is no joke. But I know how you feel. I'm ready to see what Starfleet in this time period is like!"
"I've already been given some interesting offers for away missions. Has anyone ever heard of some place called 'Quark's' before?"
"Not that I don't trust our ensigns to handle things, but I'd appreciate if you kept an eye on them, Captain. Y'know, just in case."
